Overview.content:
OpenCms scales images if requested and caches scaled versions. We demonstrate how to use the <cms:img>-tag in a formatter to scale images.

Note that this is just one way to scale images. Images may also be scaled, cropped, etc. when inserting them into the content. Consult theÂ description of the VfsImageWidget for such options.

Teaser.content: See the <cms:img> tag in action and learn about the image scaling facilities in OpenCms.
